p: Thematic analysis was used for analyzing the data. All audiotaped interviews were carefully transcribed verbatim. Manual analysis was performed by the research team through constant reading and rereading, coding, and analysis of the data collected from the participants. Each interview was analyzed using the same process until all transcripts had been analyzed. The process of coding, categorizing, and originating the major themes were discussed with all research team members to ensure accuracy and consistency.
